name: Chaotic Good Dog
description:
What goes through the mind of a dog?

Why do they hate the doorbell?

Whats the appeal of poop?

Why are they so prone to running in circles?

This game does not address any of these issues, but it was inspired by these great unknowns. Play as a very chaotic yet equally good dog who follows its own rules and get what it wants no matter the cost in this short yet challenging fast paced runner-style 3D platformer.

Featuring:

  • Five Challenging Levels!
  • Cute Cartoon Graphics!
  • Dog-Based EDM Soundtrack!
  • A Certified Good Gog!

Music by Malin Pappas of Ziggurat! Check out Malin at https://malinp.bandcamp.com/ and his band at https://www.facebook.com/colonelmalin/ !

A game by Bonnie Bolton.

Special thanks to Michael Baker for the base code and the great semester!

Thanks to my parents' particularly chaotic dog River and my good boy Sirius for the inspiration and support, as always.
